title: helo guys i am right castledin rewok
body:
fist her base ad minused to zero 

passive giv 100 ad aginst minions and 45% damge minusing, taking dmg gives atak sped 


q damage minused to zero
q quiets you for 3 seconds

w give one hundred percent of money when actived and used on enemy, health removal removed

e now stun you for 3 seconds,  negative healing removed

r no longer additions extra money cost when cast but no longer reduces bad guy health

he is now panzer who controls the unruly masses and has good skipping around map

riot pls help castledin {{champion:38}}

What's confusing?

Maxe perfuk sins to me
I had a stroke reading this but I'm all bett n
Sounds like a typical Olaf player.

Riot, I see no reason for you not to hire this man. Brilliant ideas, really opens up castledin counterplay. Makes her more viable, as well. The only part I'm unsure on is letting castledin do damage to minions, seems like it could get out of hand. Better nerf Irelia.
Dude nice bro.
